text:
e="preserve">Janelle M. Burke is a botanist in the US. She has been affiliated with Cornell University and Howard University.
She specializes in plant systematics and plant evolutionary biology of Polygonaceae.
This author is usually abbreviated «Jan.M.Burke» when citing a botanical name.
Works.
[https://www.researchgate.net/publication/257776284_Revised_subfamily_classification_for_Polygonaceae_with_a_tribal_classification_for_Eriogonoideae Revised subfamily classification for Polygonaceae with a tribal classification for Eriogonoideae] Brittonia 63(4): 510–520.
